description: Starts with the series logo followed by Masaru running in front of Yokohama Marine Tower towards an attacking Cockatrimon. Masaru explains that Digimon are running amok but he will fight them together with Agumon, while Gaomon, Lalamon, Tohma and Yoshino are briefly shown on screen. Agumon evolves to GeoGreymon, and finally Masaru tells when the series starts airing.
